DLF Home Developers Limited Regulatory Filing:DLF Home Developers Limited submitted a revised Compliance Report on Corporate Governance to NSE in accordance with SEBI regulations. This update includes details on committee positions and reflects the appointments of Mr. Mahender Singh as an Additional Director (Independent) and Mr. Badal Bagri as an Additional Director (Non-Executive) effective March 27, 2025.
